title: Tribunal, is it disabled still? or what...
body:
Okay so i spend more time playing this game than i'd like to admit, and a moderate amount of the time ive come across toxics, ragers, feeders, just bad mannered players in general. Now i try my best to keep my cool in those games and save my salt for the post game reports, but ive reported so many people now that i cant quite come to terms with the fact i haven't gotten ONE report card back saying someone had been punished. It cant possibly be that every reportable person ive come across has been a first time offender and was just "having a bad game". 

All of this radio silence is really quite disheartening tbh, i would think after all that grief and frustration, id get **some** justice and peace of mind. So whats the go? Are player report cards still in the workshop and becoming active soon™? What exactly is going on with the tribunal right now, where is it at and when can we expect a polished tribunal? (if i get a "soon™" response i might just flip a table)

i read in another thread here  http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Q2HLQ31e-the-new-report-system-is-an-absolute-laugh-gj-guys?comment=000200020000 that Maraudaur said:
> We are going to be bring player voting back soon™

Does this mean we're expecting a tribunal report system similar to the old case by case system?

Another small question i have is about the player report feedback cards themselves. I saw a [preview](http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1438866670/c391e749b2369dd18679a4e743137dae.png) of what they look like and to me that just looks like a generic "someone was punished but we wont tell you who, when, why or what the punishment was... just that something happened". To me that kind of "feedback" is **VERY** lacklustre and imo, the satisfaction of knowing the who's what's and why's of the punishment are half the motivation to bother with the report in the first case! To me if that's what the player report card notification is then... well it's almost not worth the effort of filing a report to begin with.

Any Riot staff who could answer some of this would be hella sweet thanks {{champion:119}}
